clipboardHistory.value:
unbind C-b
set -g prefix C-a
bind C-a send-prefix

# Set the prefix to ^A.
unbind C-b
set -g prefix ^A
bind a send-prefix

if type -q tmux
    if not test -n "$TMUX"
        tmux attach-session -t default; or tmux new-session -s default
    end
end

# fzf on Fedora
        if [ -x "$(command -v fzf)"  ]
        then
            source /usr/share/fzf/shell/key-bindings.bash
        fi
nix-shell -p gnumake gcc clang ncurses vim-full xorg.libXt libgtkflow3
Cannot open backend: no allocator available

set undofile
set undolevels=5000
set undodir=~/.vim/undodir/
dd bs=4M if=path/to/.iso of=/dev/My_flash_drive conv=fsync oflag=direct status=progress
